reviews.customers_say: Customers love the coat's attention to detail and appreciate its beautiful craftsmanship, noting it's hand-made and made of soft wool. The fit is perfect, and customers find it warm. The zipper quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it tricky to use. Opinions about the sizing are mixed, with some saying it's true to size while others report sizing issues.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top quality craftsmanship totally impressed..
items.body: This is an absolutely beautiful sweater the craftsmanship and attention to detail is absolutely lovely. The sweater does run big so I would suggest going down a size.. it’s extremely comfortable and very warm, the attention to detail even in the zipper is absolutely wonderful I would extremely recommend this item. The item surprised me and arrived a few days early. Read more
items.author: JP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Navy blue sweater
items.body: I ordered the XL . It was way too big. I sent it back and was refunded immediately. I then ordered a large, and it fits nicely. This is a beautiful, well made sweater. I highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Jim Sundstedt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The coat is hand made and top quality.
items.body: This is the second time buying from this company, and I will say this Knitted Zip Coat is nice looking and made solid. My wife is so happy with this coat for sure. The coat is hand made and top quality. Read more
items.author: Larry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb Craftmanship and Quality
items.body: I have two of these sweaters and I love them. Warm, keeps the cold out and fit is perfect and not itchy like you think wool would be. I have a very heavy artic coat that is not as warm as this, nor as light weight. Price is great. Highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Gerri 89

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, value Irish hand knit sweater
items.body: Outstanding quality, beautiful sweater from Ireland. Read more
items.author: RAD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Aran Crafts Irish Sweaters
items.body: The sweater I ordered is gone in the first photo. Sweater was too large in a size small. Quality Of Merino Wool and knitting is exquisite. This company is amazing.!! Only flaw is the double zipper which is awkward to maneuver. I ordered a shorter side zip sweater in same color, in a small and it is spectacular ! Read more
items.author: Judith Desjardins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: Beautiful sweater! Excellent style and fabulous quality! Fits perfectly! Very warm! Read more
items.author: Jeanne Bohman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and pretty!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater. Very flattering. The color is gorgeous and feels lush. It runs true to size. Would buy again in another color. Read more
items.author: Sylvana

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Damson, Navy, Parsnip, Army Green, Mallard Blue, Natural, Cherry Red, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
